title: Jim Harold's Crime Scene
example.1: “Alexa, tell Crime Scene to play the newest episode”
example.2: “Alexa, tell Crime Scene to go back 5 episodes”
example.3: “Alexa, tell Crime Scene to fast forward 2 minutes”
details: Jim Harold interviews authors and experts on true crime cases. Past guests have included a Pulitzer Prize winner and Best Selling authors. Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be offered the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to skip forward and backward by entire episodes, and you can also fast forward and rewind within episodes themselves. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes released; or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:**Skip Entire Episodes**— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa skip” or “Alexa tell Crime Scene to skip ahead 5 episodes”**Fast Forward/Back Within Episode**— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, tell Crime Scene to fast forward 2 minutes”— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, tell Crime Scene to rewind 45 seconds”**Select Newest Episode**— “Alexa, tell Crime Scene to play the newest episode”

title: Crime Scene
details: The crime rates in Alexton are increasing day by day and you are appointed as a police detective, who will be responsible to decrease those numbers! Hear murder mysteries, judge the alibis, inspect the crime scene, and at last guess the killer!The suspects will try to confuse you with their statements, but don't fall for their phony words!  Make powerful judgments, throw criminals behind the bars, and make Alexton crime-free again!If you do so, the senior officer will appreciate your work, but if you fail, (Beware) get prepared to get a scolding.

title: Tamil Verse
example.1: “Alexa ask tamil verse to tell me verse 5”
example.2: “Alexa ask tamil verse to tell me prologue 12”
example.3: “Alexa ask tamil verse to tell me something”
details: This skill help us to learn Thirukurral using english transliteration ie. We can request verse(kural) by number, ask skill to recite all verse(kural) in a prologue(athikaram or ask some random verse(kural). Commands are as below"Alexa ask tamil verse to tell me verse 5"- this will recite kural 5"Alexa ask tamil verse to tell me prologue 12"- this will recite all ten kural from athikaram 12"Alexa ask tamil verse to tell me something"- this will recite random kural with kural number"Alexa Help"-for help text"Alexa stop"=For stop the reciting"Alexa Open Tamil Verse" for welcome text and possible commandsupdated some of tamil phonetics and emphasis only on tamil wordsfor any update request please contact kramnewdev@gmail.comConsidered as chef d'oeuvre of both Indian and world literature,the Tirukkural is one of the most important works in the Tamil language. This is reflected in some of the other names by which the text is given by, such as Tamiḻ maṟai (Tamil veda), Poyyāmoḻi (words that never fail), and Deiva nūl (divine text).Translated into at least 40 languages as of 2014, Tirukkural is one of the most widely translated non-religious works in the world. The work is dated to sometime between the third and first centuries BCE and is considered to precede Silappatikaram (1st century CE) and Manimekalai (between 1st and 5th centuries CE), since they both acknowledge the Kural text. Because the life, culture and ethics of the Tamils are considered to be solely defined in terms of the values set by the Tirukkural, the government and the people of Tamil Nadu alike uphold the text with utmost reverence.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tirukkuṛaḷ

title: tamil verse
example.2: “Ask Tamil Verse to read verse five”
example.3: “Ask Tamil Verse to read about friendship”
details: This skill help you to learn Tirukkuṛaḷ, written by Thiruvalluvar consists of three books, the first book on Aram (the Way or Dharma or Virtues), the second on Porul (Material or Artha or Wealth) and the third on Inbam (Joy or Kama or Love).You can request for a kuṛaḷ(verse) by number, or ask for a random kuṛaḷ. If you have something specific in mind, you can search for virtues or wealth or love(different paals in Tirukkuṛaḷ)."Alexa Open Tamil Verse""Alexa Ask Tamil Verse to read verse five""Alexa Ask Tamil Verse about Army""Alexa Ask Tamil Verse to tell me about State""Alexa Ask Tamil Verse to tell me verse twelve""Alexa Ask Tamil Verse to tell me Chapter twelve""Read verse about friendship from Tamil Verse""Read about gratitude from Tamil Verse"In the next version, will add 'tamil audio' for the kurals and searches based on kural text.If you have any feedback, please add them in the review/comments of this app.Ref: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tirukkuṛaḷ

title: Prayer Helper
example.1: “Alexa ask prayer helper to pray Our Father”

details: This Alexa skill will recite 20 of the most common catholic prayers. Learn new prayers or just meditate on one you know. To start a prayer simply say the name of the prayer. Below you will find the list of current prayers. - Our Father- Hail mary- Glory Be- The apostle's creed - The nicene creed - Hail holy queen - Anima Christi - Memorare - The Angelus- Saint Michael Prayer - Act of contrition- Miraculous Medal Prayer - Morning offering- Guardian Angel Prayer - Grace before meals - Grace after meals - Serenity prayer- Saint Jose Maria's Prayer - Prayer to the Holy Spirit- Prayer to Saint Joseph.

title: Prayer Helper
details: Listen to the recitation of multiple prayers via simple requests.Premium Feature: New voices will read the prayers aloud. You can set a voice at any time with a simple request. Included voices:* Olivia* Elizabeth* Harper* Samuel* Oscar* Lily* Alexander* Neha* Tamanna* Maya* George* Grace* Abigail* JackIncluded prayers:- Our Father- Sign of the Cross- Hail Mary- Glory Be- Apostle's Creed- Nicene Creed- Guardian Angel Prayer- Prayer to St. Michael the Archangel- Act of Contrition- The Magnificat- The Angelus- The Memorare- Salve Regina (Hail Holy Mother)- Litany of Mary- Hail Joseph- Act of Faith- Act of Hope- Act of Love- Pope Benedict XVI's Prayer for Vocations- Prayer of St. Thomas Aquinas- Prayer of St. Dominic- Prayer of St. Benedict- Prayer of St. Francis of AssisiYou can also ask what prayers are available to hear a list (and see the options if you have a screen). If you enjoy this skill, please consider leaving a review. If you have a request for new prayers to be added or new features please contact me directly.

It’s bigger on the inside!HOW AND WHY IS THIS SKILL UPDATED?Lets try something awesome, shall we? For every FIVE, 5 Star reviews this skill gets in the Alexa app, the developer, Digital Pratik, promises to update the skill with new positive affirmations. So, by leaving a 5 star review you tell the developer it's worth putting more time into development. Costs you nothing, and inspires further development.. easy right?Example: The skill currently (as of writing this) has zero 5 star reviews in the Alexa app, when it gets FIVE more 5 star review, the skill will then get an upgrade. Simple, done. That way you can easily do your part to help improve, and continue development of this positive affirmation skill.. cool, right?Your positive feedback = more development of this positive affirmations skill. Thanks in advance!

title: Elementary Math
example.2: “Alexa, ask Elementary Math to practice multiplication.”
example.3: “Alexa, tell Elementary Math to set difficulty to medium.”
details: Elementary Math is a skill that allows children in grades 1 through 4 to practice basic math questions. The skill will ask what kind of math should be practiced in a session. The choices are addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division. Once a choice is made, the skill generates 5 questions on that type of problem. Each response is marked correct or incorrect and instant feedback is given. The results of a session are stored so that the user is reminded what he or she worked on last time. To start the skill, or a new session, say "Open Elementary Math". After that, the skill will guide the user on what kind of math questions to practice. You can set the difficulty level to easy (default), medium, or hard.

title: Spooky Tales
details: Spooky tales lets you listen to a quick horror tale. Some of these will make you think and some others can cause nightmares. So be prepared for the scares!How To UseThe skill is really easy to use. Just say "Alexa, open Spooky Tales." You will be asked if you'd like to listen to more tales after she tells you one. You can answer either with a "Yes" or a "No."

title: Spooky Tales
details: This skill will let you hear spooky sounds.Happy Halloween.This skill was built with love by VoiceApps.com.  Visit us to create your own skill in minutes!

title: Daily Bread
details: Have trouble deciding what to eat? Not anymore. Allow Daily Bread to take the guess work out of your next meal. Simply ask Daily Bread what to eat and it will provide you with the answer.

title: Daily Bread
example.2: “Alexa, ask Daily Bread to sign up for daily emails”
example.3: “Alexa, ask Daily Bread to list verses”
details: This skill will help you be in the word daily. Sign up for daily emails-- if you have email notifications for an app on your phone, you will be reminded wherever you are. When you ask, Alexa will read you today's verse. If you have the echo show, you can also read along. You can also say "list verses" to list the current week's verses. We take a day off each week to talk with our friends about these verses. If you subscribe, you can receive any day's verses via email when you ask.

title: Summer Night Sounds
details: Relaxing ambient sounds from a warm summer night in the country. Listen to the crickets chirp as you relax, meditate, or fall asleep.Sound file freely available at https://freesound.org/people/eric5335/sounds/102129/licensed under creative commons https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

title: Summer Night Sounds
details: Summer Night Sounds is a great way to relax, meditate or fall asleep. title: Word Scramble
example.2: “Alexa, ask word scramble to give me a word”
example.3: “Alexa, ask word scramble to tell me about the rules”
details: Word scramble is a great game to test your vocabulary! Simply say "Alexa, ask word scramble to play", it will give you a random sequence of alphabetical letters, then you will have 20 seconds to figure out which word these letters can form. For example, if you hear  "a, l, p, e, p", after 20 seconds, you can answer "it's apple", or say "I don't know" to get the answer.

title: Word Scramble
details: Word Scramble is designed to exercise your attention and short-term memory, which are important factors for career success. Far too many people experience a decline in working memory as they age. Keep your short-term memory sharp with a daily Word Scramble! And get familiar with Alexa too!Do you have a longer attention-span than your kids? Are you a better listener than your husband? Are you better at remembering things than your wife? Take thirty seconds or so and find out!Four random numbers will be listed and the challenge is to say them in reverse order. And then the same for four colors, four animals, and finally four flowers. There are 21 possible numbers, 9 possible colors, 23 possible animals and 11 possible flowers.At the end of each session, games won and lost will be reported.If you enjoy this game, please remember to rate and review.

title: Turn Up Skill
details: Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until all your upcoming events. Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for a specific events.This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.

title: Turn Up
details: The skill allows users to learn randomized psychology facts.

title: Finesser
example.2: “Alexa ask hit me up for facts”
example.3: “Alexa ask hit me up to fact me”
details: This skill displays complements to help boost the users mood. It works with any device with alexa but correct grammar should be used.

title: Hit Me Up! by Travis Rotz
details: I love to laugh! I made this mainly for myself. I think this skill is hilarious; It never stops amusing me.I also made this to learn how to make Alexa Skills using the Alexa Skills Kit (ASK). This was also made using the ASK CLI.

title: Six Pack Abs
example.3: “Alexa, ask Six Pack Abs to start workout”
details: Work out with Alexa throughout the week. Once you open the skill, just ask Alexa to start the workout. You can also ask Alexa for your progress.This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.

title: How to Get Six Pack Abs
details: You aspire to have a perfect six pack abs.You want to six pack or 8 pack abs will not be too far away for you if you do these abs exercise.No need equipment, no need for expensive gyms, not too expensive, do not spend too much time moving. To use this skill just say "Alexa six pack abs" and Alexa will take care of they rest!These tips include a variety of different subjects. Such as workout routines, how to eat less, gain muscle, lose fat, and finally get rid of that belly fat. We hope this skill helps you enjoy yourself next time you're at the beach :)Requests:If you want to talk, over ways to improve, feel free to reach out at dvirftw at gmail dot comSHOW YOUR SUPPORT:If you love How to get six pack abs, please give it a 5-star rating in the Alexa app. If you think it isn't worthy of a 5-star rating please let us know how we can make it better by sending us an email at support@xmobmedia.com.

title: Hello Kitty Fan Trivia Game
details: A simple trivia game to test your knowledge about Hello Kitty. Start the game by saying "Alexa Start Kitty Trivia". The trivia will give you multiple choice answers. Reply with the number of the correct answer. E.g.Alexa: "What is the color of Hello Kitty's hair bow? 1 : Red, 2: Pink,  3: Blue, 4: Yellow"User: "1"Alexa: "Correct. Your score is 2"Note: This skill is not sponsored or endorsed by Hello Kitty. It is an unofficial (fan) version.

title: Kitty Trivia
details: You will be asked 10 multiple choice questions on cats, try to score 100%. Some might be more challenging than you would expect. Wow your friends with your new found feline knowledge.
